Read the roman_cities.csv file into a DataFrame.
Filter out rows where the 'Select Bibliography' field is null to keep only cities that list at least one source.
Iterate over the remaining 'Select Bibliography' entries, remove period characters and split each entry on semicolons to isolate individual source strings.
Insert every cleaned source string into a Python set to guarantee uniqueness.
Return / print the size of that set, giving the total count of unique sources used in the dataset.
